message:
SYSTEM: ORCO_Feb2013_RDFa_Intro.pdf: Página 3
Motivations of ORCO
What?
RDFa (Resource Description Framework in Attributes)
human-readable data can be annotated with machine-
readable indicators for programs to interpret
Why?
“Eat our own food”
Increase visibility to search engines (e.g., Google, Yahoo!) 
and to semantic indexers (e.g., Sindice)
Allow better access and reuse of our data
How?
“Learning by doing”
Annotating our personal web pages semantically
3
speaker: SYSTEM
